page.title: 04MEDIA 1
page.content: Our survey about TV programmes showed that most children in Hullavington watched equal amounts of BBC1 and ITV. The most popular programmes were "Scooby and Scrabby Doo","The Young Ones" and "Cartoon Time". Amongst adults it was found that the most popular channel was BBC1,followed by ITV,BBC2 then Channel 4. The favourite type of programme was 'soap opera',but also very popular were serials,The News,sports and crime programmes.Most people watched about three hours of television each day. 58% of people in our survey had a video.The vast majority owned as opposed to hired them.Videos were used mostly for recording programmes, but films were also hired regularly.
